original_title: It Takes All Kinds - Tónleikarnir, baðkarið, listamaðurinn
overview: 3 short films in a series based on ideas from an exhibition of 100 drawings in Gallery Langbrók in Reykjavík, 1983. The Concert: A devil is playing the piano. The Bathtub: Jesus is taking a bath. The Artist: An artist is painting out in the open and gets a nasty surprise.
title: It Takes All Kinds - The Concert, The Bathtub, The Artist
